titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Speaker to administer the oath of office to Representative-elect Sala Burton from the State of California.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/7/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Speaker of the House of Representatives to administer the oath of office to the Honorable Sala Burton of California at Washington, District of Columbia.
